import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; function StudentRegister() { const history=useNavigate(); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ studentname: '', rollNo: '', branch: '', section: '', semester: '', phoneNumber: '', personalEmail: '', officialEmail: '', parentName: '', parentPhoneNumber: '', parentEmail: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '', }); const [errorMessage, setErrorMessage] = useState(''); const [hovered, setHovered] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if ( !formData.studentname || !formData.rollNo || !formData.branch || !formData.section || !formData.semester || !formData.phoneNumber || !formData.personalEmail || !formData.officialEmail || !formData.parentName || !formData.parentEmail || !formData.password || !formData.confirmPassword ) { setErrorMessage('Please fill in all fields'); return; } try { const response = await axios.post('http://localhost:3000/StudentRegister', formData); console.log(response.data); navigate('/login'); setFormData({ studentname: '', rollNo: '', branch: '', section: '', semester: '', phoneNumber: '', personalEmail: '', officialEmail: '', parentName: '', parentPhoneNumber: '', parentEmail: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '', }) .then(res=>{ if(res.data=="exist"){ history("/StudentLogin") } if(res.data=="notexist"){ alert("Student not registered") } }) } catch (error) { console.log(error); setErrorMessage('An error occurred. Please try again later.'); } }; const styles = { formContainer: { maxWidth: '400px', margin: '0 auto', padding: '20px', border: '1px solid #ccc', borderRadius: '5px', boxShadow: '0 0 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)', }, heading: { textAlign: 'center', marginBottom: '20px', }, label: { display: 'block', marginBottom: '10px', fontWeight: 'bold', }, input: { width: '100%', padding: '10px', marginBottom: '20px', border: '1px solid #ccc', borderRadius: '4px', }, select: { width: '100%', padding: '10px', marginBottom: '20px', border: '1px solid #ccc', borderRadius: '4px', }, button: { backgroundColor: '#007bff', color: '#fff', border: 'none', padding: '10px 20px', borderRadius: '4px', cursor: 'pointer', transition: 'background-color 0.3s', // Add transition for a smooth effect }, buttonHover: { backgroundColor: '#0056b3', // Change the background color on hover }, formGroup: { marginBottom: '20px', }, }; return (

Student Registration

); } export default StudentRegister;
